The Blade of Frontiers

The Blade of Frontiers is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. The Blade of Frontiers can be acquired from Wyll during Chapter One of the First Act. Completing The Blade of Frontiers will progress Wyll's story forward. Wyll's progress has since been modified from Early Access since the official release of BG3. This page
